content: lil freddy is the sixth in my horror kitties collection inspired by my love of horror movies the finished kitty stands about 9 inches tall materials 4 5mm hook - 3 5mm hook for hat and glove worsted weight yarn - red green dark brown brown black light gray and for the skin you will want a red/orange variegated i wanted rhss in chili but couldn t find it so i settled for rhss omber in hot sauce embroidery floss or crochet thread in black scissors yarn needle fiber fill safety eyes & safety nose gauge not important uses less than one full skein of yarn
